body.name: GOTHAM STEEL 2 Pc Non Stick Frying Pans Set, 5.5 Inch Egg Frying Pan Nonstick Frying Pan 9 Inch, Egg Pan, Non Stick Pan, Frying Pans Nonstick, Skillet Set, Oven Safe, Non Toxic, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 17 mins
features: GOTHAM STEEL COPPER FRYING PAN SET – The Gotham Steel nonstick frying pan is a cook’s essential has a wide flat-bottom, nonstick surface and gently sloped sides. Count on it for everything from scrambling eggs and sautéing vegetables to searing meats, making pancakes and much more. Includes one 5.5 inch mini egg pan and one 9 inch frying pan.

ULTRA NONSTICK – The nonstick cooking surface is coated three times and reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No oil or butter needed makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup
EFFORTLESS CLEANUP/DISHWASHER SAFE– Spend less time with cleanup! After all the cooking and prepping is done, place cookware in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup

METAL UTENSIL SAFE – The coating of the pan is infused with diamonds, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use
EVEN HEAT DISTRIBUTION – Aluminum composition ensures even heat distribution all around with no dead zones or hot spots

HEALTHY & 100% NON-TOXIC – the Gotham Steel coating is derived from minerals and reinforced with diamonds, making this frying pan free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for an eco-friendly, healthy experience
STOVETOP & OVEN SAFE - Compatible with most stovetops (gas, electric, glass) & oven safe up to 500° F. Please note: the pans are not induction compatible.
STAY COOL HANDLES – The stainless-steel handles are ergonomically designed for both righty and lefties & the unique Y shaped handles let’s heat escape and keeps the handles cool to the touch

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Nonstick. Coated three times with our mineral coating for the ultimate nonstick experience – without oil and butter. Food glides around on the pan and nothing sticks, even after years of use. 100% PFOA Free. The healthy mineral nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium, so it will never release toxic fumes, even if it’s accidentally overheated. Metal Utensil Safe. The coating is reinforced with diamond-like particles, making it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks & even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use. Dishwasher Safe. Easy cleanup. Simply wipe down and throw in the dishwasher for the super quick experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pans arrived in a timely matter. Don’t have to use any kind of oil they clean up super nice I would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small is best!
reviews.reviewText: I hate using a large skillet to fry one egg. The less clean-up, the better! Non-stick. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2-pack: Non-Stick Frying Pans Set, 5.5 & 9"
reviews.reviewText: The tiny 5.5" pan is great for a single/thicker egg -- it cooks evenly and is easy to wipe out to clean.Yes, it still needs a little oil/butter -- but, if you are frying an egg, you want that anyway.The 9" pan is a reg. small frying pan -- it cooks evenly and is easy to wipe out to clean.Both of these pans did well with either a hand wash (Dawn) or in the dishwasher.Both have stay-cool handles.I just don't think the price (currently $25) for two pans, one of which is so specific/tiny, is worth it.You can get a set of 3 reg. frying pans for $25 pretty much anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were a Christmas present. He liked them very well. They were of good quality and the right size.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars El cumplimiento en los tiempos de entrega
reviews.reviewText: La calidad del producto muy resistente de excelente calidad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Impressive Non-stick capabilities, eggs fall right off the pan
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. All I can summarize my review is WOW, this is a very nonstick pan and Eggs don't stick. It is advertised as no butter and no nonstick spray needed and I did use some butter as I prefer to cook eggs with a light coating of butter for flavor but those eggs slid right out of the pan without issue. I used a similar pan in a timeshare and if anyone has stayed in a timeshare, almost any pan they have are not nonstick but these were holding up eggscellently! I had a similar non stick pan that was green in color and lost its non-stick capabilities a few months in. Hoping that this pan lasts much longer. I am fairly impressed that it isn't super smooth yet still offers excellent non stick coating to the pan.Final thoughts:Offers true non stick performance (tested with eggs)Ability to use with Metal Utensils (I won't be testing this personally)Good Medium weight pan (not super heavy, not super lightweight either)Recommended to use low to medium heat only (no high searing capabilities)Recommendation:Yes, I would purchase again and recommend to my friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The GOTHAM STEEL 2pc non-stick frying pans are very good quality pans. I'm not an egg eater nor a fry food person 😑 so I mostly use them for reheating. The tiny pan is ideal for a single serving of veggies They are lightweight, easy to clean and look great on my stove!😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not very heavy duty. Not asNon stick as they say.
